content.rendered:
On January 24, 11 AM UTC, we’ll have the AMA session with Komodo, the first open, composable smart chain platform, in our Telegram chat!

The rules are:

  • Learn about the project we’re hosting
  • Join the live session in our Telegram chat
  • Pass the quiz (link to google forms will be shared at the AMA)
  • Take part in the live chat with Komodo

The pool for the AMA with Komodo is $500 KMD.

  • $400 for all quiz participants, who pass the quiz successfully
  • $100 will be shared between 5-10 users who ask the best questions on Twitter or in the live chat.

To pass the quiz – learn about Komodo Platform.

Download Atomic wallet to get KMD-address!

Subscribe to our Twitter:

  • Atomic Wallet
  • Komodo

Subscribe to Telegram channels:

  • Atomic Wallet
  • Komodo

The Google forms will be sent during the session in our Telegram chat. Don’t miss it out!

excerpt.rendered: On January 24, 11 AM UTC, we’ll have the AMA session with Komodo, the first open, composable smart chain platform in our Telegram chat!
